appSubtitle: Practice the municipal election – interactive & easy to understand
mobileHint: For the best experience, use a larger screen
disclaimer: This is a private information service and is not affiliated with the City of Frankfurt am Main or the election office. All information without guarantee. Visit frankfurt.de/wahlen for official election documents.
citizenshipTitle: Which ballot do you want to practice?
citizenshipSubtitle: Choose the ballot that matches your citizenship.
germanCitizenDesc: Ballot for the City Council (STVV) – the "Römer".
nonGermanCitizenDesc: Ballot for the Municipal Foreigners' Advisory Council (KAV).
stvvDesc: The city parliament – elected by all Germans and EU citizens aged 18+.
kavDesc: Advisory council for foreign residents without EU passport, aged 18+.
